backend/main.mo: Defines the main Motoko actor with authorization mixins, blob storage, and many public types for articles, profiles, subscriptions, journals, and related domain models.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Production deployment guide outlining pre-deployment checks and steps for promoting a reviewed build.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, theme variables, and color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that mounts the frontend app and loads the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/offline-bundle/assets/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to keep the assets directory in version control.
frontend/offline-bundle/css/styles.css: Standalone CSS defining full styling for the offline bundle including layout, typography, header, hero, and UI components.
frontend/offline-bundle/fonts/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the fonts directory is tracked.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/hero-illu: SVG illustration used in the offline bundle's hero section.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/journal-p: SVG placeholder showing a stylized journal with lines and a circular emblem.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/logo.svg: SVG logo featuring a circular background, plant-like central shape, arrows, and decorative side elements.
frontend/offline-bundle/index.html: Main offline portal homepage with navigation, hero section, about content, and structured sections for the Agrigence site.
frontend/offline-bundle/js/app.js: Handles mobile menu toggling, smooth scrolling, form validation, submission alerts, and section-based nav highlighting.
frontend/offline-bundle/README.md: Instructions for using the offline bundle, explaining how to open and navigate the standalone offline site.
frontend/project/admin.html: Admin panel HTML providing user search, profile viewing, payment management, and submission management UI structures.
frontend/project/assets/.gitkeep: Empty placeholder file to retain the assets directory in version control.
frontend/project/css/main.css: Main stylesheet defining layout, typography, colors, buttons, forms, and admin/dashboard styling for the project.
frontend/project/dashboard.html: User dashboard page with profile display/editing, photo upload, payment status, and submission sections.
frontend/project/index.html: Login and registration page with forms for authentication, account creation, and password recovery navigation.
frontend/project/js/admin.js: Admin panel logic handling admin authentication, user search, viewing user details, and updating payments, passwords, and submissions.
frontend/project/js/auth.js: Authentication module providing login, registration, password reset, session handling, and access-control helpers.
frontend/project/js/dashboard.js: Dashboard logic for loading and editing user profile, managing password changes, submissions, payments, and photo uploads.
frontend/project/js/db.js: LocalStorage-backed dummy database with seed data and helper functions for users, sessions, payments, and submissions.
frontend/project/js/main.js: Initializes pages based on URL and handles login, registration, password reset, and view switching on the index page.
frontend/project/README.md: Documentation describing features, usage, accounts, and workflows of the offline journal portal mini‑app.
frontend/project/receipts/.gitkeep: Empty file used to retain the receipts directory in version control.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app’s routing, query client, theming, and main route tree for all pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an alert informing the user they lack permission to access the page.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: Renders a live countdown to the 25th of each month and updates every second.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Shows the footer with submission deadline, contact info, social links, and a visitor counter.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main navigation bar with search, authentication handling, and responsive menus.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps pages with the header, marquee banner, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Displays an animated loading screen that fades out after progress completes.
frontend/src/components/NoticeMarqueeBan: Shows a scrolling banner of notices when enabled via configuration.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Renders a user profile setup dialog with form fields and submits data via useSaveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupDialo: Provides a dialog to configure Stripe by submitting a secret key and allowed countries through a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/VisitorCounter.t: Displays a visitor counter that increments and stores the count in localStorage on each load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook to manage login, identity state, and persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, admin checks, banners, news, and other data operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, typography, and custom utility animations and components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutContactPage.tsx: Renders an About and Contact page with mission info, founder details, and a contact form with toast-based submission feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelContent.tsx: Implements a comprehensive admin interface for managing news, blogs, journals, editorial members, terms, and banner settings using multiple data hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Checks admin status and conditionally renders the admin panel or access-denied and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleSubmissionPage: Provides an article submission form with file upload, subscription checks, and mutation-based submission logic.
Displays detailed author, formatting, and publication guidelines and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows user profile, articles, and subscription status, prompting login or profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/pages/EditorialBoardPage.ts: Displays a grid of editorial board members fetched from the backend with profile images, roles, and contact details. Includes helper functions for image URL normalization and initials generation.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordPage.ts: Provides a form for users to request a password reset, currently using a placeholder toast due to unimplemented backend logic. Handles validation, loading states, and success/error messages.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section and dynamically loaded news, blogs, magazines, reviews, and article previews. Includes helpers for date formatting and star rating rendering.
frontend/src/pages/JournalsPage.tsx: Shows the current journal issue and an archive filtered by year, with options to download journal PDFs. Fetches current and yearly journals and manages year selection state.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements a login form for email/password authentication, currently using placeholder behavior until backend auth is implemented. Manages form validation, loading state, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Displays news and blog posts with tab switching, fetching data from query hooks and rendering cards with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/NoticeBoardPage.tsx: File is empty and contains no implemented UI or logic.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with details and buttons to retry, contact support, or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies Stripe payment status, creates a subscription if successful, and displays success or error states with loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Implements a signup form with validation, error handling, and placeholder logic until backend registration is implemented.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Fetches subscription plans, checks Stripe setup, and allows authenticated users to initiate checkout sessions for plan purchases.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditionsPag: Loads and displays Terms and Conditions content with loading and error states using a styled card layout.
frontend/src/utils/optimizeImage.ts: Provides client‑side image resizing/compression via canvas and a fallback that returns the original file if optimization fails or is larger.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Simple helpers to set the document title and meta description, plus a combined SEO setter.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL params (including hash routing), storing them in sessionStorage, retrieving persisted values, and clearing stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing architecture, features, known issues, and generated assets for the Agrigence IC web app.
